author: Masamune Okami

text:
@masterplusmargarita I don't get the kids argument. I see tons of the little fuckers playing CoD all day, a supposed "mature" game. And the only people I ever hear really talking about how awesome pokemon is are older people or at least more mature people. I'd say pokemon's for older people. 

Aside from that, yeah Ruby and Sapphire are my favorite games as well. Something about gen 3 was just really great, can't put my finger on it.
author: - Maphiko -

text: God I remember growing up with just a Game Boy Color at age 6 playing pokemon Crystal and Yellow Versions. I got a Gameboy Advance for my 7th Christmas. I remember wanting Ruby Version so freaking bad but never getting it. Then my mom told me she'd buy any game I wanted for doing a good job helping us move to a new house. I chose this game and I haven't regretted it since. Fucking love this game <3

author: Aubade

text:
I think these are the best games in the Pokemon series. For some reason, this generation gets very little love, but I have a lot of fun with it, and actually put them above the first gen games (Which are awesome).

Also, Pokemon is for kids? Maybe. But I wouldn't call Mario exactly mature, and I've never seen HIS games called kiddie games, or mature people called inmature because of playing them. Pokemon is still one of the best series out there, admit it or not.

I get teary-eyed just thinking of all the great times
